featured.text: 24 children can attend any family affair without seeing the adults enjoying their liquor.
In addition, advertisements for liquor, on TV and in print, show situations that are 29 to the young.

definition.zh_def: 含有酒精的飲料，通常用於飲用或調製雞尾酒。
definition.en_def: A distilled alcoholic beverage, often used for drinking or mixing in cocktails.
definition.example: He decided to order a glass of liquor at the bar.
